intro: Delissea rollandioides, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its upright growth habit and showy, tubular flowers. The plant typically features velvety, dark green leaves with a distinctive waxy texture. It thrives in bright, indirect light and requires well-draining soil to prevent root rot. Delissea rollandioides is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
